Text1: An bi Saraki da sharri a lokacin, ta yadda duk matsalar da ta faru sai a ce don Saraki na Shuagaban Majalisar Dattawa ne.
Text1 Translation: Saraki was treated badly at that time, so that all the problems that happened had to be said to be because of Saraki, the President of the Senate.
Text2: Majiyar ta ce an shaida masu sansanonin sun fi shida, don haka su na neman sai dai a biya kowane sansani naira miliyan biyar.
Text2 Translation: The source said that the owners of the camps have been told that there are more than six, so they are only asking for five million naira to be paid for each camp.

Text1: Ba a taɓa yin gogarman ɓarawon akwati kamar Obasanjo ba.
Text1 Translation: There has never been a box thief like Obasanjo.
Text2: Domin a Tarihi ba a taɓa yin Shugaban Majalisar da ya tsone wa Shugaban Ƙasa ido kamar sa ba.
Text2 Translation: Because in history, there has never been a President of the Parliament who has looked down on the President like him.

Text1: INEC ba za ta rufe rajistar zaɓen 2023 a ƙarshen Yuni ba – Farfesa Yakubu
Text1 Translation: INEC will not close the 2023 election registration at the end of June - Professor Yakubu
Text2: A ranar Juma’a, 17 Ga Yuni ne INEC za ta rufe karɓar sunayen masu takarar mataimakin shugaban ƙasa.
Text2 Translation: On Friday, June 17, INEC will close the nomination process for the vice presidential candidates.

Text1: Ficewar Najatu Mohammed daga APC ta koma wurin Atiku na PDP ya ƙara fito wa abin da wasu ke ganin cewa matsalolin Tinubu ne.
Text1 Translation: The departure of Najatu Mohammed from APC to Atiku of PDP further exposes what some see as Tinubu's problems.
Text2: IDAN KURA NA MAGANIN ZAWO…: PDP ta ce APC ta ji da matsalolin da ke jikin Tinubu, ta daina magana kan rikicin rundunar ATIKU 2023
Text2 Translation: IF THE DUST OF THE MEDICINE COMES...: PDP says APC is aware of the problems in Tinubu's body, it has stopped talking about the ATIKU 2023 crisis

Text1: “A ɓangaren mu, gwamnatin mu za ta ci gaba da bada fifikon kare rayukan ‘yan Najeriya a duk ƙasar da su ke zaune a duniya.
Text1 Translation: "On our part, our government will continue to give priority to protecting the lives of Nigerians in all the countries they live in the world.
Text2: Kuma ya na ƙara jaddada cewa gwamnatin sa za ta ci gaba da kare rayukan jama’a.”
Text2 Translation: And he emphasized that his government will continue to protect the lives of the people."

Text1: Idan ba a manta ba a watan Maris ne ‘yan bindiga suka yi garkuwa da fasinjojin jirgin kasa da ya taso daga Abuja zuwa Kaduna.
Text1 Translation: If we don't forget, in March, bandits kidnapped the passengers of a train traveling from Abuja to Kaduna.
Text2: Ƴan bindiga sun buɗe wa tawagar motocin sarkin Buguɗu, Maimartaba Hassan Attahiru a Hanyar Abuja zuwa Kaduna.
Text2 Translation: Gunmen opened fire on the motorcade of the Emir of Bugudu, His Highness Hassan Attahiru on the Abuja to Kaduna road.

Text1: Mutanen sun ce a dalilin harin mutane da dama sun ji rauni a jikkunan su.
Text1 Translation: The people said that as a result of the attack, many people were injured in their bodies.
Text2: Mutane da dama sun zama ‘yan gudun hijira a dalilin harin da ‘yan bindigan suka yi tsakanin ranar Juma’a da Asabar din da suka gabata.
Text2 Translation: Many people became refugees because of the attack by the bandits between last Friday and Saturday.
